file(GLOB SOURCES ./*.cpp)
file(GLOB HEADERS ./*.h)
if(EMSCRIPTEN)
  add_library(imgui STATIC ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})
else()
  add_library(imgui SHARED ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})
  set_property(TARGET imgui PROPERTY WINDOWS_EXPORT_ALL_SYMBOLS ON)
endif()
target_compile_definitions(imgui PUBLIC -DIMGUI_IMPL_OPENGL_LOADER_GLEW)
